name: Gnome Mercy
description:
Your parents have left you in charge of your younger siblings. Unfortunately, you accidentally broke a cursed lawn ornament and the gnomes are out for revenge. Protect the baby triplets with the power of defenestration!

[WASD]- Move

[space] - Jump

[left click] - Pick up/charge throw

Made for a "game jam 1v1" with a friend. Stand by for a link to the other game.
